ComicInfo.Summary: Areala is forced to fight Cheetah, Jade and Lord Akuma; a U.S. war vet prepares an attack on Father Gomez's church, and Ottoman prepares the Teutonic Knights as his evil scheme comes closer to its realization.

ComicInfo.Title: Triumph of the Will; S.H.O.C. Troops
